projects.title: Epicodus Projects

projects.tech: JavaScript, Angular, React, C#, ASP .NET MVC, MySQL HTML, and CSS

homeContent.about: I am hardworking web developer, who is motivated to self-development in order to deliver results. I consider traveling to be a passion in my life, so being flexible is one of the skills that I have acquired. It has changed my perspective on the world and has allowed me to become personable to naturally excel in unfamiliar situations. I enjoy experiencing and embracing other cultures and believe in the importance of cultural diversity.
homeContent.journey: I am a recent graduate of a 7 month long intensive programming bootcamp called Epicodus. I also recently completed an internship at a software company called Soro, where I assisted with Front End Development of an internal web application. I love to learn and implement new technologies. Nowadays, you can find me trying to stay on top of technologies by listening to podcasts and reading new articles. I am a big fan of Javascript. I strive to mentor those around me and push to deliver the best possible work
